alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 4:05AM PST until March 02 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 6 PM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 1500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and Northern Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 6 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow accumulations will be above 3000 feet. Areas below 3000 feet will likely see a brief period of rain before precipitation pauses Thursday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades
